# Course information {-}

## Useful additional resources {-}
Besides the mandatory and recommended reading for this course, there are some additional resources that are worth checking out:

1. The command line. [The Missing Semester of Your CS Education](https://missing.csail.mit.edu/): MIT's introduction course on mastering the command line.

2. Some more command line. [explainshell.com](https://www.explainshell.com/); for when you cannot figure it out with MIT's introduction.

3. Regular expressions. [regexr.com](https://regexr.com/5d21d); an online tool to develop and check your regular expressions.

4. Mapmaking. [colorbrewer 2.0](https://colorbrewer2.org); an online tool to select colour palettes for your maps and visualisations.

## Noticed a mistake? {-}
